snippet.title: Shikon-X Astro Defense Fortress Demo Trailer V1.5
snippet.description:
Shikon-X is a space adventure game where you play as Major Daaia, the best pilot in the Federation. During your first combat mission, you receive a mysterious transmission from the attackers, which kick-starts an epic intergalactic quest to uncover the truth about the war, and your place in it.

You've never played an adventure game like this before! Shikon-X features streamlined controls: you only have one inventory and one interaction button, no verbs and no pixel hunting, just interact with the environment and characters, and don't worry about anything else. There are also a lot of arcade-style mini-games to enjoy along the way.

This is the trailer for Shikon-X's demo, you can play it for free right now on Steam! Make sure to wishlist it and share, so all adventure gamers can find it!
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1298270/ShikonX_Astro_Defense_Fortress/
